product_name: DAKINE Pace Bike Shorts - Men's - 2012 Closeout
long_description: Offering a 14 in. inseam for plenty of coverage during intense sessions on your mountain bike, the men's DAKINE Pace shorts keep you comfortable with quick-drying polyester fabric. Reinforced stitching in key areas increases durability, and gusseted crotch allows unrestricted range of motion. Waist adjustment tabs; zippered fly with 2-button closure. The men's DAKINE Pace shorts feature belt loops and front and back hand pockets. Closeout.
short_description: Offering a 14 in. inseam for plenty of coverage during intense sessions on your mountain bike, the men's DAKINE Pace shorts keep you comfortable with quick-drying polyester fabric.
